dublin_core.dcvalue: The Digital Infrastructure for Vaccination Open Credentialing or DIVOC is an open-source platform that enables countries to digitally orchestrate large-scale health campaigns such as vaccination and certification programs.

Digital Infrastructure for Vaccination Open Credentialing (DIVOC) Architecture and Implementation
